title: Simulation Training for Enhancing Police Creative Thinking in Crisis Situations

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Utilizing smartphone-based simulation training systems alongside offline field training

learning_goals: Learners can propose three or more creative response strategies in crisis situations.
Learners can improve cognitive load management skills by 20% after simulation training.
Learners can apply innovative approaches at least once during retraining on the same scenario.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
